original_text: So Saul took three thousand able young men from all Israel and set out to look for David and his men near the Crags of the Wild Goats.
korean_text: 사울이 온 이스라엘에서 택한 사람 삼천 명을 거느리고 다윗과 그의 사람들을 찾으러 들염소 바위로 갈새

sentences.original_text: So Saul took three thousand able young men
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 사울은 이천 명의 능력 있는 젊은이들을 데리고

sentences.original_text: and set out to look for David
near the Crags of the Wild Goats.
